mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user_register (user_num, user_id, user_name, user_email, user_pw, user_phone_num, user_gender, user_birth, user_kakao_email, user_facebook_email) values(0, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPw}, #{userPhoneNum}, #{userGender}, #{userBirth}, #{userKakaoEmail}, #{userFacebookEmail})
mapper.select: select count(user_id) from tbl_user_register where user_id = #{userId}
select user_num, user_id, user_name, user_pw, user_gender, user_birth, user_email, user_phone_num from tbl_user_register order by user_name desc
select count(user_num) from tbl_user_register where user_id = #{userId} and user_pw = #{userPw}
